name: Deway
description: Deway is a software development company that specializes in solutions for mobile devices (iOS and Android). They create applications for Web, Smartphones, Tablets, and other devices. They work with state-of-the-art technology, agile methodologies, and the best platforms to facilitate and optimize the results of their clients.  They continually strive for excellence in their services, aiming to increase the productivity of their customers.
